title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4116.7 - Examination of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4116.7 - Examination of license

State Regulations

No driver will be permitted to drive in a race at a
licensed harness racing meeting until such driver has presented his or her
commission driver's license to the recording judge for
examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4116.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
